titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to improve the program related to home and community based care.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2648)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/10/1993--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act with respect to the home- and community-based care program to: (1) revise income and disability eligibility requirements; (2) limit the number of States which may participate in such program; (3) permit States to limit the number of individuals who may receive program services; and (4) revise application of Medicaid spousal impoverishment rules to spouses of individuals receiving program services.
